answers.answer: I felt bad immediately after I drunk that orange crap.
yu should call yur doctor... cuz that doesnt sound too good :/
When is the average time to take the two hour exam???...I'm srry that u feel that way..mamacita try drinking some h20 for starters
that happened to me it was awful did u eat yet

I've had 6 big glasses in the past few hours, but they're not helping. And people usually take the 1 hour test around 24-30 weeks and if it comes back abnormal then you have to take the 3 hour one but my doctor is making me take mine at 15 weeks because of my preeclampsia
I ate a sandwich, and I felt better for a few and now I feel awful again.
Aww I'm so sorry. I would call my midwife or a nurse hotline
your sugar may be dropping try eating something sweet and i had to do mine early i think i was 14 weeks
It does sound like your sugar is low. Maybe some sweet cereal.
I ate a cookie earlier and laid down for a while and now I feel a lot better. Thanks yall!

That drink make me sick too. I was told it was alot stronger than the one from the one hour test.Try eating more food and drink plenty of water.The result normally take a few days to come in and lot of people pass the three hours test even when they fail the one hour screening.
A plain biscuit helpd me wen i had mine last wweek.

question: I've felt horrible all day after my three hour glucose test. I'm extremely lightheaded, I've blacked out several times, and I feel super jumpy/shaky. They wouldn't tell me my results today, but this just makes me think that the results are bad. And I also have no desire to eat, whenever I'm usually starving. I feel like something is wrong :(
title: three hour glucose test
